channel.title: Uber 3 db
channel.description:
Well, im not sure whats going on.... but i have setup uber 3 source... and setup a mysql db....
which the details would be
dbname : runescape host : localhost user : root pass :
now i have entered all of these into the server.java and then compiled it.... and here comes the problem.
1. The user doesnt save, it simply restarts the user everytime he or she logs out. 2. It only shows the head of the person 3. No doors wrk, but npcs do....
can sum1 plz help me? i have uploaded teh uber db files to the database called runescape using easyphp and phpmyadmin...

item.title: Uber 3 db
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Who the heck though of ‘moreinfo’. Why not just add more to the character file. Then when the 474 server came out they were dumb enough to have a moreinfo table also. What the heck is wrong with your people. If your going to be dumb and save your characters in text files, at least save it all in one file. Having two files is like committing suicide twice.

Read full topic
